# PlayCraft - AI Game Builder
> Create browser games using natural language with AI assistance

## About PlayCraft

PlayCraft is an AI-powered platform that lets anyone create browser-based games without coding experience. Users describe their game idea in plain English, and AI generates fully playable HTML5 games in seconds.

## Core Value Proposition

- **No coding required**: Describe your game in natural language
- **Instant results**: See your game running in real-time as you describe it
- **Full customization**: Edit and iterate with AI assistance
- **One-click publishing**: Share your games with the world instantly

## Key Features

### Game Creation
- Natural language game descriptions
- AI-powered code generation using advanced LLMs
- Real-time preview with hot reloading
- Support for 2D and 3D games (Three.js)
- Multiple game templates (platformers, shooters, puzzles, etc.)

### Asset Generation
- AI-generated sprites and characters
- Background and environment generation
- Multiple art styles: pixel-art, cartoon, realistic, anime, fantasy
- Automatic icon generation for published games

### Publishing
- One-click game publishing
- Custom game URLs (slug-based)
- Play count tracking
- Social sharing support

### Discovery
- Game playground to browse community games
- Category filtering (action, puzzle, adventure, arcade)
- Search functionality
- Trending and new releases sections

## Technology Stack

- Frontend: React, TypeScript, Vite
- Backend: Supabase (PostgreSQL, Edge Functions)
- AI: Gemini for code generation and image generation
- Deployment: Vercel

## API Endpoints

Games are served via Edge Functions:
- Game files: `/api/game/{gameId}/index.html`
- Game assets: `/api/game/{gameId}/{asset}`

## Common Questions

### What is PlayCraft?
PlayCraft is an AI-powered game builder that lets you create browser games by describing them in natural language. No coding experience needed.

### How do I create a game?
Simply type a description of your game idea (e.g., "Create a space shooter where I defend Earth from asteroids") and PlayCraft's AI will generate a playable game instantly.

### Is PlayCraft free?
Yes, PlayCraft offers a free tier that lets you create and publish games. Premium features are available for advanced users.

### What types of games can I create?
You can create various browser-based games including platformers, shooters, puzzle games, arcade games, RPGs, and even 3D games using Three.js.

### Can I edit the generated code?
Yes, PlayCraft provides a full code editor where you can view and modify the generated code. You can also ask the AI to make specific changes.

### How do I publish my game?
Click the "Publish" button in the builder. Your game will be available at a unique URL that you can share with anyone.
